name: Polyland
description:
Polyland

Polyland - is Top Down Arena Shooter, where your main goal is to survive as long as you can and earn as many points as possible! (This description will be updated! But only tomorrow, because I really want to sleep...)

Author's note

Making this game was HELL, literally. In the beginning, once we found these game jams, we decided to remake an old MS-Dos game called "Operation Carnage". For a while, everything worked out for us, but one day we saw that the time for one of the jams was almost over, and the game was not even half-done yet ... So we made a risky decision to completely remake the game for a remake of "Crimsonland ", which was easier, but not without problems. As a result, in 2 days it turned out to roughly recreate the gameplay, cut out a large number of unfinished mechanics and glue the game together just a couple of hours before the feeling of sleep began to overcome our bodies. So yeah... it was fun!
